thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Phil King
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Phil King

author: Phil King
title: Phil King
text: We hired an older car. To be honest it had few of the extras you get on new cars these days, it showed its age and it was a bit tatty; however it was clean and functional. I was nervous beforehand about our decision to hire an older car; however I would certainly make the same choice next time. We got a large car with an enormous boot for less than a new small car would have cost. The staff were friendly, quick, efficient, and helpful. When asked they gave us accurate directions to a good supermarket.
